name: perl-i18n
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl-i18n-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: Mailing list to discuss i18n (g11n, l10n) using Perl. Questions, success and failure stories, UTF-8 (with Perl) and encodings (with Perl) discussion welcome.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: perl-i18n-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: perl-i18n-help@perl.org
